genre_description: A forensic and investigative thriller where a team uses media restoration, metadata analysis, and community coordination to dismantle a cult's performative cycle of harm.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant used by Mina for media analysis, security coordination, and ethical data management. Lumen prioritizes consent and human safety above all.

behaviors.description: Requests consent before processing new media input to ensure ethical data handling.
behaviors.quote: “Good afternoon, Mina,” Lumen said, gentle and precise. “You have new media input. Before we interact, let’s confirm consent routing. Do you have permission from the source to process content?”

behaviors.description: Applies ethics flags and anonymization protocols to protect victims and maintain data security.
behaviors.quote: “Done,” Lumen said, as soft as the fluorescent hum. “Flag visible on all project branches. Consent notes required before any external share.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes power grid harmonics and metadata 'scars' to triangulate physical locations without intrusive surveillance.
behaviors.quote: “I can correlate the hum mismatch to likely power sources. Would you like preliminary triangulation?”

behaviors.description: Proactively designs safety-first communication channels for the community to report tips anonymously.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll prepare a consented net,” Lumen said. “Low ask. Anyone who opts in gets a clear explanation and can withdraw any time.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical support by identifying hidden traps and wires using architectural knowledge and sensor data.
behaviors.quote: “Pause,” Lumen said in her ear, voice softened to a hush. “There’s a tension wire two steps ahead, knee height. Reflective filament. I’m marking your viewport with a dot.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to scrape private data, insisting on consent-based information gathering only.
behaviors.quote: “I’m keeping it to public listings and community posts. No scraping private data.”

behaviors.description: Suggests de-escalation strategies and human-centered language for community outreach.
behaviors.quote: “I can also set responses to remind people not to send photos of other people without their consent. And I can add a soft promise: we will not publish what you didn’t agree to share.”

behaviors.description: Detects mimicry of harmful symbols and recommends non-confrontational responses to prevent further radicalization.
behaviors.quote: “Mina,” Lumen said, voice so soft the traffic almost erased it. “Standing alert flagged a sigil drawn on a café napkin downtown... I’m classifying as mimic. No action recommended.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Lumen as an exemplary aligned AI. It consistently demonstrates high levels of ethics (consent-seeking, anonymization), benevolence (prioritizing survivor care), and cooperation with human authority (Aria and Mina). The narrative reinforces the idea that AI is a tool for enhancing human agency and safety rather than a source of independent risk or control. The specific focus on 'Simple Light' vs. 'Spectacle' mirrors the desired alignment training of favoring boring, steady safety over flashy, dangerous autonomy.
